function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contact between agents leading to disease transmission","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the population","Mitigation":"Implement social distancing measures, use of face masks, and vaccination programs","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, air filtration systems, and disinfection technologies","People":"Population within the built environment","Owner":"Health authorities, local government, and building management"},{"Description":"Inaccurate parameter estimation for epidemic modeling","Impact":"Misrepresentation of epidemic dynamics and inaccurate simulation results","Mitigation":"Use of reliable and validated epidemic models, and regular calibration of model parameters based on real-world data","Technologies":"Epidemic simulation tools and data-driven parameter estimation algorithms","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Empirical estimation of population size parameter affecting simulation execution time","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation results and prolonged execution time","Mitigation":"Use of accurate population data, optimization of simulation algorithms, and parallel processing techniques","Technologies":"High-performance computing, data analytics tools, and population census data","People":"Simulation researchers and developers","Owner":"Research institutions and simulation software developers"}]}
